articles.author: Dominic King
articles.title: Jurgen Klopp insists Liverpool's tie with Inter Milan still 'dangerous' despite two-goal advantage - Daily Mail
articles.description: Late goals from Roberto Firmino and Mohamed Salah were enough for Liverpool to beat Inter Milan 2-0 at the San Siro in their best European away day since Bayern Munich in March 2019.
articles.content:
Jurgen Klopp warned Liverpool's players there is still much work to be done despite them taking a huge step towards the Champions League quarter-finals.

articles.author: Lenin Ndebele
articles.title: Southern African leaders arrive in Brussels for EU-AU Summit with high hopes - News24
articles.description: Southern African heads of state and their representatives have started arriving in Brussels, Belgium, for the 6th European Union-African Union Summit with high hopes for their respective countries.
articles.content:
• President Emmerson Mnangagwa of Zimbabwe is seeking to re-engage with a post-UK EU gathering.
